original_text:
The oracle concerning Dumah.
One is calling to me from Seir,
    “Watchman, what time of the night?
    Watchman, what time of the night?”

sentences.original_text: One is calling to me from Seir,
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람이 세일에서 나에게 부르고 있으며,

sentences.original_text: Watchman, what time of the night?
Watchman, what time of the night?
